author: Gus_263
title: Johnny thunder again
review: Another adventurers car, included previously with kelloggs on UK. This also have the minifigure of Johnny thunder, the main character of the theme. The car have a different front, to looks like with old cars. Like the other promotional cars, it isn't very complete, because few pieces can't build a complete car, but other vehicles like rafts or carts. The colors are great, like the details of the minifigure, that combines with a little plate on the base of the car. The wheels are too little and low, but it combines with the car's front. Is cool for a little set, is rare now, like the minifigure of Johnny Thunder.

author: legoman4694
title: rare
review: this set is very rare due to its only in a cerial box. its good for a cerial box toy but the part on the front is very big and doesnt go well with the rest of the car. also you can never have too many johnny thunders (believe me i have about 15). its good if your collecting adventurers

author: legoguysw
title: A promotion for you, and your Lego men collection...
review: Promotionsl sets are great, they can hand out a load of cool figs and pieces, all for free. This one is no different, featuring the great Johnny Thunder fig, who i think is absolutely beautiful. This set was where i got my only Johnny Thunder fig, whom i treasure. So the car may be a bit rubbish, and more like a kids cardboard box go-cart, but hey, you don't lose anything, its free, plus you get a cool grill piece, and some yummy corn flakes!
